title: Mirror of Germany. No. 161 = Deutschland Spiegel
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Germany - Social life and customs
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Heads of state
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Social realism
description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: Heavy snowfalls in Germany affected the traffic in all cities; the first indoor show-jumping contest of the Olympic year; agricultural show "Green Week" in Berlin; a memorial exhibition of the work of Kathe Kollwitz, famous social realist artist; the Chancellor and Foreign Minister visit Rome then Paris; the largest International Toy Fair at Nuremberg; Munich's first swimming School for babies; Frankfurt's "Senckenberg Nature Museum" housing a valuable collection for natural research; daily gymnastics in a Munich hall including ski instructions.
